languages.text: "Значит, правильные вещи говорит. А еще от его благословений похлебка стала не такой мерзкой, так что пусть остается".

traits.locale_text: "Раз не повязали, значит, правильные вещи говорит. А еще от его благословений похлебка стала не такой мерзкой, так что пусть остается".

languages.text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."
languages.original_text: "Значит, правильные вещи говорит. А еще от его благословений похлебка стала не такой мерзкой, так что пусть остается".

traits.locale_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."
"He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."
"He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."
"He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."
"He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."

languages.text: «Será que lo que dice es verdad. Y con sus bendiciones la sopa no sabe tan mal, así que por lo que a mí respecta se puede quedar cuanto quiera».
languages.original_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."

traits.locale_text: «Será que lo que dice es verdad. Y con sus bendiciones la sopa no sabe tan mal, así que por lo que a mí respecta se puede quedar cuanto quiera».

languages.text: 「彼は正しいことを言っているに違いない。彼の祝福のおかげでスープも不味くなくなった。だから彼はここに残ってもよろしい。少なくとも、私がいる限りは」
languages.original_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は正しいことを言っているに違いない。彼の祝福のおかげでスープも不味くなくなった。だから彼はここに残ってもよろしい。少なくとも、私がいる限りは」

languages.text: “肯定是因为他说得对呗。有了他的祝福，那些汤也没那么让人恶心了，反正我是觉得他留在这里挺好的。”
languages.original_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."

traits.locale_text: “肯定是因为他说得对呗。有了他的祝福，那些汤也没那么让人恶心了，反正我是觉得他留在这里挺好的。”

languages.text: "Er muss die richtigen Dinge sagen. Und die Suppe ist dank seines Segens auch nicht mehr ganz so widerlich. Von mir aus kann er bleiben."
languages.original_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."

traits.locale_text: "Er muss die richtigen Dinge sagen. Und die Suppe ist dank seines Segens auch nicht mehr ganz so widerlich. Von mir aus kann er bleiben."

languages.text: « Il faut croire qu'il y a du vrai dans ce qu'il dit. Et puis, il faut bien avouer que la soupe est un peu moins infecte grâce à ses bénédictions, alors en ce qui me concerne, il ne me dérange pas, bien au contraire. »
languages.original_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut croire qu'il y a du vrai dans ce qu'il dit. Et puis, il faut bien avouer que la soupe est un peu moins infecte grâce à ses bénédictions, alors en ce qui me concerne, il ne me dérange pas, bien au contraire. »

languages.text: "Doğruyu söylüyor olmalı. Ayrıca lütufları sayesinde çorba da bir nebze daha az iğrenç oluyor. Yani bence kalmasında bir sakınca yok."
languages.original_text: "He must be saying the right things. And his blessings have made the soup less disgusting, too, so he can stay, as far as I'm concerned."
